languages.text: "Возможно, вам бы присутствие там было бы нипочем, могучий Ульфар. Но я бы, скорее всего, лишилась бы собственных очей при взгляде на бушующие там цвета..."
"Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, вам бы присутствие там было бы нипочем, могучий Ульфар. Но я бы, скорее всего, лишилась бы собственных очей при взгляде на бушующие там цвета..."

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."
"Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."
"Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."
"Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

languages.text: “或许那里的情形不会对你构成威胁，强大的乌尔法，但我的眼睛可能会被翻滚的颜色弄瞎……”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

traits.locale_text: “或许那里的情形不会对你构成威胁，强大的乌尔法，但我的眼睛可能会被翻滚的颜色弄瞎……”

languages.text: « Nul doute que vous ne risqueriez rien si vous étiez sur place, puissant Ulfar, mais pour ma part, le probable déferlement de couleurs risquerait de me faire perdre la vue. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

traits.locale_text: « Nul doute que vous ne risqueriez rien si vous étiez sur place, puissant Ulfar, mais pour ma part, le probable déferlement de couleurs risquerait de me faire perdre la vue. »

languages.text: «Tal vez estar allí no sería una amenaza para el poderoso Ulfar, pero yo perdería la vista al contemplar los colores arremolinados...».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez estar allí no sería una amenaza para el poderoso Ulfar, pero yo perdería la vista al contemplar los colores arremolinados...».

languages.text: 「もう脅威は去ったようです、猛きウルファー。ですがそこの濁った色たちを見ていると、私の視力が失われそうです…」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

traits.locale_text: 「もう脅威は去ったようです、猛きウルファー。ですがそこの濁った色たちを見ていると、私の視力が失われそうです…」

languages.text: "Für Euch würde es vielleicht keine Gefahr darstellen, dort zu sein, mächtiger Ulfar. Doch ich würde wohl meine Augen verlieren ob des Anblicks der tosenden Farben dort ..."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

traits.locale_text: "Für Euch würde es vielleicht keine Gefahr darstellen, dort zu sein, mächtiger Ulfar. Doch ich würde wohl meine Augen verlieren ob des Anblicks der tosenden Farben dort ..."

languages.original_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

languages.text: "Orada bulunmak senin için tehlikeli olmayabilir Ulfar. Bense oradaki renkleri gördüğüm anda gözlerimi kaybedebilirim..."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps being there would pose no threat to you, mighty Ulfar, but I would likely lose my eyes at the sight of the colours roiling there..."

traits.locale_text: "Orada bulunmak senin için tehlikeli olmayabilir Ulfar ama ben oradaki renkleri gördüğüm anda gözlerimi kaybedebilirim..."
